title: Summer Monteys Fullam flaunts figure in a TINY white bikini during Cyprus getaway
text:
She has lashed out claims that she 'used' her ex Paul Hollywood for fame and fortune.

And Summer Monteys Fullam, 24, didn't appear to have a care in the world as she frolicked in the ocean in sun-kissed Cyrus earlier this week.

The horse-riding enthusiast, who dated the GBBO judge, 53, for two years, showed off her phenomenal figure in a tiny white bikini as she took to the waters.

There she is! Summer Monteys Fullam, 24, looked sensational as she frolicked in the ocean in sun-kissed Cyrus earlier this week

Summer's skimpy white triangle bikini top featured subtle floral detailing and just about managed to contain her ample assets in place.

Her toned abs were on full display, as were her toned legs, as she lined the shores.

Summer relied on her naturally striking features with a simple coat of bronzed, dewy make-up.

Her fiery red locks were tamed in place with a pair of shades, and later a black baseball cap.

Her beach sighting comes after she claimed that the assumption she was with Paul for fame 'couldn't be further from the truth', while admitting she is still healing from their bitter break-up two months ago.

'People think I've used this relationship to be successful, when people see a younger girl with an older guy or vice versa, they think that person is using the wealthier partner- but that's far from the truth,' Summer told New Magazine.

The qualified horse whisperer said it was 'easy to judge her' because she didn't have the 'wealth, fame and high profile' like Paul and that people forget there was 'love, commitment, care and respect' between them.

Pretty: Summer relied on her naturally striking features with a simple coat of bronzed, dewy make-up

Summer essentials: Her fiery red locks were tamed in place with a pair of shades, and later a black baseball cap

Say cheese! Summer looked like she was having a fabulous time as she was seen taking a sizzling selfie

Relaxing: Summer also got comfortable on the sandy, pebbly beach in a bid to top up her tan

The pair separated in a high-profile break-up in August, after she dumped him for asking her to sign a non-disclosure agreement.

But Summer admitted she is still healing from the relationship and doesn't want to jump into anything just yet.

'Anyone who's come out of a big relationship doesn't necessarily want to get into another one straight away, I've just come out a very serious relationship and I'm not ready to replace that,' she said.

Summer continued: 'It's a healing process... I'm not ruling it out but at the moment I'm getting over a huge break-up.'

Lashing out: Summer recently lashed out claims that she 'used' her ex Paul Hollywood for fame and fortune

Innocent: She claimed that the assumption she was with Paul for fame 'couldn't be further from the truth'

Talking further about her high-profile romance, Summer said people 'assume you're not very nice' as she firmly shut down claims she dated Paul for his money.

And while Summer isn't ready to move on, she claimed earlier this month that Paul moved onto another woman several years his junior when he began seeing pub manager Melissa Spalding, 36.

Paul became close to Melissa after he spent a lot of time in her pub, the Chequers in the Kent village of Smarden, after Summer dumped him.

He had met Summer while arranging a birthday party for his estranged wife Alexandra two years ago.
